question: Who has won the women's singles 2018 China Open badminton title?
explanation: Carolina Marin from Spain has won the women\'s singles 2018 China Open badminton title. In the final, she defeated Chen Yufei  in Changzhou, China. Earlier, in 2018, she won the BWF World Championships for the third time and became the first ever female badminton athlete to have achieved this feat. Apart from this, Indonesia\'s Anthony Sinisuka Ginting beat Japan\'s Kento Momota to take the 2018 Men\'s singles China Open title.
